Design Doc for Magic Carpet Game

An attempt to re-create the Bullfrog Classic

Uses XNA 4.0 and Bullet-XNA for collision detection.



Game Entities
  * Player
  * Magician
  * Manaball
  * Balloon
  * Spells
  * World/Terrain



Spells
  * [SpellHeal Heal]
  * [SpellTurbo Turbo]
  * [SpellFireball Fireball]
  * [SpellRubberBand RubberBand]
  * [SpellCastle Castle]
  * [SpellLightning Lightning]
  * [SpellConvert Convert]
  * [SpellSwarmOfBees Swarm of Bees]
  * [SpellLowerRaise Lower / Raise Land]
  * [SpellEarthquake Earthquake]
  * [SpellVolcano Volcano]
  * [SpellSkeletalArmy Skeletal Army]


AI States
   * Idle
   * Hunt
   * Roam
   * Attack
   * Defend
   * Acquire
   * Build
   * Flee
